body_html: @girving But I can't change the ps device, I know it's bound in /GPU:0 by default. So it may cause the conflicting memory allocation with worker0. And why all workers hanging even though the ps is ready, is it a bug? or something else?

body: @girving But I can't change the ps device, I know it's bound in /GPU:0 by default. So it may cause the `conflicting memory allocation` with worker0. And why all workers hanging even though the ps is ready, is it a bug? or something else?
